__e: You said yourself the most important thing right now is finding the Stone of Tears.
Good thing we don't have anything else to do, like find the Stone of Tears.
Now, it seems that I am the only living soul who knows what to do with the Stone of Tears.
I feel nothing, I'm like a piece of ice!
I thought that was a real rock. No.
Well .. next to the stone out there.
We're between a rock and you-know-who's hard ass, so...
Look, I'm not saying it does, but if Ben's death and the rock had something to do with each other, and now the little girl's got some...
The man talked to a rock for goodness sake and heard it.
You're the rock, and I'm the water!
[ Muffled Speech ] Well, now we have to get that stone and get out of here before it's too late.
You took the stone and now he is killing me with it.
This stone is the last one he's going to leave me.
Isn't that the stone you gave her?
So this means that the light of the gem stone that I saw right now. she must have also seen it.
And the next thing I knew, I had a stone angel in my hand and he was on the ground.
The stone in your hand, what is it?
Just tell me this much. Did you get the rock from my house?
I got "Stay the fuck out" written on a stone tablet in my bedroom.
This is just a bump in the road.
I am pushing up an endless mountain.
I really don't wanna step on any toes here.
To me, they're nothing more than a pain in my ass.
This is just a bump in the road.
But you, on the other hand, You're the only bump in the road.
This is just a bump on the road for me.
And that stone-hearted uncle won't give it to you.
You have to tell me where the Evil Stone is.
It's a big rock. Kind of expensive.
